title: Fringe, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread (gold strips on silk core)
Technique: plain weave
description: Fringe of red and gold threads with a patterned heading. Scalloped skirt threads in an alternating group of gold and red threads, each suppporting a red tuft.

Fringe, 18th century.Medium: silk, metallic thread (gold strips on silk core)
Technique: plain weave. 1905-2-202.
